mapper.select: SELECT *,DATE_FORMAT(e.CREATED_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') as created_time_format FROM consultation_evaluate e where e.user_b_no = #{value} order by e.CREATED_TIME desc limit 0,10
mapper.insert: insert into consultation_evaluate(USER_B_NO,USER_C_NO,CONSULTATION_ID,STARS,EVA_DESC,CREATED_BY,CREATED_TIME) select user_b_no,user_c_no, #{consultation_id}, #{stars}, #{eva_desc}, user_c_no, now() from consultation_sheet where id = #{consultation_id}
